ContentInfo.Name: Homepage
ContentInfo.Author: N/A
ContentInfo.Description: GameBanana is an active community of PC gamers who love to discuss, download, and share user-created game content. Site exists since 2001 and is developed to this day

ContentInfo.Name: Prefabs
ContentInfo.Author: N/A
ContentInfo.Description: Separately saved objects, usually consisting of multiple parts - brushes, props, or entity elements that can be used repeatedly in your maps

ContentInfo.Name: Fmpone's video tutorials
ContentInfo.Author: Fmpone
ContentInfo.Description: Fmpone is creator of de_cache and four other maps included in Valve's CS:GO. His tutorials are recordings of a Twitch broadcasts. Shawn answers questions of his viewers, shows how to start using hammer, best way to do brushwork and how to pick colors and theme for your map. His videos contain really important tips not included in any other tutorial

ContentInfo.Name: Counter-Strike Global Offensive Level Design Boot Camp
ContentInfo.Author: TopHATTwaffle
ContentInfo.Description: "Go from zero to level design hero as fast as possible". "Counter-Strike Global Offensive Level Design Boot Camp" is an complex and easy to understand video tutorial series presenting how to start mapmaking in CS:GO

ContentInfo.Name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive Level Creation (Wiki)
ContentInfo.Author: Valve
ContentInfo.Description: Wiki focused on Counter-Strike: Global Offensive level design using its authoring tools

ContentInfo.Name: Source SDK Tutorials
ContentInfo.Author: 3kliksphilip
ContentInfo.Description: Videos on how to make maps for Source-based games like Half Life 2, Counter Strike Global Offensive, Team Fortress 2, Left 4 Dead and Portal

ContentInfo.Name: Man vs. Engine
ContentInfo.Author: Will2k
ContentInfo.Description: Optimization is one of most important elements of your map. Players won't tolerate low fps! Will2k is passionated about optimization. His career revolved arround it. "Man vs. Engine" will definetly help you out with this hard topic

ContentInfo.Name: Optimization Testing in Source Engine
ContentInfo.Author: Will2k
ContentInfo.Description: Every part of your map needs testing and proper quality control. Since optimization is really important element of your map you have to make sure that you are keeping frame rate as high as possible. "Optimization Testing in Source Engine" by Will2k thoroughly describes this topic

ContentInfo.Name: TF2 Mapping Tutorials
ContentInfo.Author: UEAKCrash
ContentInfo.Description: UEAKCrash made many good tf2 maps. You may know some of them. Glassworks, trainsawlaser, wubwubwub, stoneyridge, probed, and few more maps. You see? He is very good at what is he doing. Check out his tutorial series. You will learn most important topics of TF2 mapmaking

ContentInfo.Name: VIDE
ContentInfo.Author: Nicholas Ray
ContentInfo.Description: A set of tools for the Source engine helping mappers and modders including: Hammer Splitter Editor, Package Viewer, Particle Editor, VBSP Editor, VMT Editor, Mass VMT Editor, VTF Editor, Mass VTF Editor, BSP Info, Entity Lump Editor and Pakfile Lump Editor

ContentInfo.Name: Compile Pal
ContentInfo.Author: Ruarai
ContentInfo.Description: A tool to assist in the compiling of source engine maps
